title: Unethical Therapists, Bad Training, Trauma Therapy, EMDR, DBT, and Our Attachment Styles
description:
Dr. Kirk Honda and Bob Goettle reveal their attachment styles and personality disorders, along with talking about more unethical therapists, bad training habits, trauma therapy, EMDR, and DBT.

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.

March 4, 2019.

Email: Contact@PsychologyInSeattle.com

Access archive at: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com

Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
